value:
My sister and I fight for Lord Seliph.
Surely our mother would be happy
to see us now.

So long as Lord Seliph and Prince
Shannan are at our side, the empire
will fall!

Aren't you overtaxing yourself?
You'll make everyone worry. Do
not forget that we all rely on you.

I'm itching for a fight. I must hone
my technique in battle. That desire
trumps all fear.

I always worry that Larcei will take it
into her head to run off again. She is
not the type to look before she leaps.

I was sent by $Nf
with this boon.

This technique stands above all
others in Isaach—handed down
by the Sword Saint Od!

Do not forget that I am a swordsman
of Isaach!

I'll put in some more training. That is
what's needed.

Thank you. I'll do whatever I can
to ensure you aren't disappointed.

I am Scáthach, a warrior descended
from Od, the Sword Saint. I fight
with the pride of Isaach in my heart.

Prince Shannan has told me more
than once that Larcei may have an
even stronger will than our mother.$k$pI know so little about Mother...
Neither Larcei nor I do. I am always
happy to hear anything about her.$k$pLarcei clings to the hope that she is
out there, somewhere... I do hope so
too, but...$k$pI...$k$pI must put these feelings aside and
focus on battle. I will make use of
the techniques I inherited from her!
たあっ
でやあっ
ぐっ…
手強い…！
You have gone too far.
How about this now?
I am with Lord Seliph!
I think not!
Larcei... It's up to you...
sigh
My name is Scáthach. I am Larcei's twin.
Huh? That was sudden!
Lord Seliph is so gallant. It is an honor to fight by his side.
Don't think I've forgotten the pain the empire has caused us.
In a battle of wills, Larcei might best our mother. That's what Prince Shannan says, at any rate.
It is time I turned toward the truth… Our mother died at Belhalla.
Don't push yourself. You can be rash.
This way, you say?
Mustn't argue.
I am off.
